lead_paragraph: Consumer groups had urged the agency to close a loophole that keeps patients harmed by generic drugs from suing manufacturers.

headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Delays Decision on Generic Drug Labels
headline.main: F.D.A. Delays Rule on Generic Drug Labels

snippet: Consumer groups had urged the agency to close a loophole that keeps patients harmed by generic drugs from suing manufacturers.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration delays until 2017 decision on whether to require generic drug companies to assume more responsibility for warning patients on labels about product risks.
